mapper.select: select SID, TITLE, QUESTION, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, ANSWER, STATUS, STATUSNAME, STATUSFLAG, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKDESCR, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MEMBER, CUSTOMERTYPE, CUSTOMERNAME, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, ALIAS1, ALIAS2, ALIAS3, ALIAS4, APPOINTMEMBER, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, RESERVE15, RESERVE16, RESERVE17 from DB_TASK where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
